Package com.irurueta.ar.slam

Class AbsoluteOrientationSlamCalibrator

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.ar.slam.BaseSlamCalibrator<D>
com.irurueta.ar.slam.AbsoluteOrientationBaseSlamCalibrator<AbsoluteOrientationSlamCalibrationData>
com.irurueta.ar.slam.AbsoluteOrientationSlamCalibrator
public class AbsoluteOrientationSlamCalibrator extends AbsoluteOrientationBaseSlamCalibrator<AbsoluteOrientationSlamCalibrationData>
Processes data to estimate calibration for absolute orientation SLAM estimator. This class must be used while gathering data for a system being kept constant (under no motion).

  • Nested Class Summary
